儫字的基本解释

儫
háo
古同“豪”。

儫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［háo］
［《廣韻》胡刀切，平豪，匣。］
亦作“儫1”。
(1)豪猪。
(2)豪猪等身上的刺。亦指刚硬的长毛。
(3)豪俊。才德、力量或威望出众的人。
(4)统帅，首领。
(5)旧指有钱有势或依仗权势横行不法的人。
(6)迅猛；强劲。
(7)桀骜；强横。
(8)豪放；豪迈。
(9)形容声音响亮。
(10)奢侈；豪华。
(11)方言。撅起。
(12)通“毫”。长而细的毛。
(13)通“毫”。笔豪。亦借指毛笔。
(14)通“毫”。比喻极细微。
(15)通“毫”。重量或长度单位。十丝为一毫，十毫为一厘。
(16)通“嚎”。嚎叫。
(17)通“濠”。参见“豪濮”。
(18)通“秏”。参见“豪亂”。
(19)山名。即崤。
(20)姓。宋代有豪彦。

儫字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　儫； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页121第04
【字彙補】音義與豪同。字見《前秦錄》。【補遺】。

【字彙補】與豪同。見《前秦錄》。
儫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
儫字的起名意思

古同"豪"。

儫
Basic explanation of words
儫
háo
Gu Tong "hao".
儫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［háo］
["Guangyun" razor cut, Pinghao, Xia. ]
Also known as "儫1".
(1) Porcupine.
(2) The spines on the body of a porcupine. Also refers to stiff long hair.
(3) Haojun. A person of outstanding virtue, strength, or prestige.
(4) Commander, leader.
(5) Old refers to people who are rich and powerful or who relied on power and power to commit crimes.
(6) Rapid; strong.
(7) Unruly; tyrannical.
(8) Bold and unrestrained; heroic.
(9) Describes a loud voice.
(10) Luxury; luxury.
(11) Dialects. Poke up.
(12) Through "milli". Long and fine hair.
(13) Through "milli". Bihao. Also refers to the writing brush.
(14) Through "milli". The metaphor is very subtle.
(15) Through "milli". Unit of weight or length. Ten silk is one cent, ten cents is one cent.
(16) Through "howl". Howl.
(17) Through "Hao". See "Hao Pu".
(18) Through "秏". See "Hao Chao".
(19) The name of the mountain. That is, Wei.
(20) Last name. There was Hao Yan in the Song Dynasty.
儫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　儫; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 121 04
【Word Supplement】The pronunciation and meaning are the same as Hao. See "Pre-Qin Lu" for words. 【addendum】. 【Word Supplement】Same as Hao. See "Pre-Qin Lu".
